author: cnbc.com
title: Philz Coffee Joins the Domopalooza Mainstage to Share How the Small Retailer is Brewing a Strong Competitive Strategy Against Brand Name Coffee Giants
text:
SILICON SLOPES, Utah, March 02, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Today Domo ® announced that Claire Morrison, Director of Operations and Christine Hsieh, Retail Analytics Lead at Philz Coffee, will join the mainstage at Domopalooza® 2018. Morrison and Hsieh will share how the popular third wave coffee maker is bridging coffee, people and data, one cup – and one Domo card – at a time. While Philz Coffee is a small retailer, Morrison and Hsieh will discuss how their organization is a strong competitor among coffee heavy weights, by leveraging Domo and its real-time data to deliver a great customer experience.
Domopalooza, Domo’s annual customer event, is designed to educate, inform and inspire Domo’s fast-growing community of users from many of the world’s most progressive organizations and most recognizable brands. From keynote presentations to dozens of breakout sessions, hands-on personalized training and networking opportunities, attendees will gain valuable lessons from industry experts and fellow customers. They’ll gain new insights on how to leverage Domo, and learn how all employees – from the CEO to front-line workers – can use Domo to connect to the right data and people, for the good of the company.
In its fourth year, Domopalooza will be held March 13 – 16, 2018, at the Salt Palace Convention Center in Salt Lake City. Domopalooza is offering an inspiring lineup of speakers including Phil Jackson, former NBA player, coach and executive and Jay Brown, Roc Nation co-founder and Chief Executive Officer. Additional mainstage and entertainment announcements are coming soon.
To learn more about how Philz Coffee and other successful organizations are using data and Domo for the good of the company, register for Domopalooza on Domopalooza’s event page .
About Domo
Domo’s mission is to help all employees – from the CEO to the front-line worker – optimize business performance by connecting them in real time to the right data and people they need to improve business results. The company works with many of the world’s leading and most progressive brands across multiple industries including retail, media and entertainment, manufacturing, finance and more. For more information, visit www.domo.com . You can also follow Domo on Twitter , Facebook , LinkedIn , Google+ , Instagram and Pinterest .
Domo and Domopalooza are registered trademarks of Domo, Inc.
